entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
